name: Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkán KM 17 B, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 1.6 km from El Rey Beach, Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property features a hot tub, evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the resort, rooms are equipped with a balcony. All rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms come with a terrace and some have sea views. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. You can play table tennis and tennis at the 5-star resort. Playa Marlin is 1.6 km from Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun, while La Isla Shopping Mall is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

description: Set in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region, 5 km from La Isla Shopping Mall, Iberostar Selection Cancun \features a private beach area and water sports facilities. There is a restaurant and guests can have fun at the water park. Every room at this resort is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV and DVD player. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a bath. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk, hairdresser's and gift shop at the property. You can play tennis at the resort. It also offers car hire. Coco Bongo is 8 km from Iberostar Selection Cancun, while Cancun Government Palace is 11 km from the property. Cancun International Airport is 10 km away.

name: Catalonia Grand Costa Mujeres
address: Carr. a Punta Sam SM 6, Lote 6 Zona Costera, Zona Continental, 77400 Punta Sam, Quintana Roo
description: Catalonia Costa Mujeres All Suites & Spais a 5* family resort, full of life and situated at one of the most beautiful beaches of the Mexican Caribbean. Our QUINTA AVENIDA, inspired by the popular Quinta Avenida of Playa del Carmen, is the heart of our resort, harboring a great variety of innovative restaurants, bars and stores. Two large pools in different areas of the hotel, one of them destinated to those who look for relaxation, while the other offers a great variety of activities and fun for the whole family. Our comfortable rooms–all suites including several rooms with swimup pool, the wide gastronomic offer, our AlegríaSpa and a complete entertainment program, make this resort the ideal place for a wonderful vacation either as a couple or with the family. Local attractions include tours to Isla Mujeres and Holbox island. For those interested in Mayan culture we recommend a visit to the Mayan Museum and the archeological site “El Rey”, both located in Cancun hotel zone.FarePortal

address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 4.5, Num Ext.: Mz 34, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Nestled between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupte Lagoon, Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa offers vibrant, contemporary décor and is located along the Cancun strip in the Hotel Zone. This beachfront resort will feature 429 suites, including the xhale club and the Unlimited-Luxury® vacation concept with a variety of luxurious amenities and services. Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa also features the standard CleanComplete Verification™ protocols on property. This 360-degree quality, safety and hygiene program takes into account every aspect of the on-property experience, backed by the highly-respected third-party certificationWebBeds

name: Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe
address: Kukulcan Km 17, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun, the resort is a short walk from Iberostar Cancun Peninsula Convention Centre and offers a private beach, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. It is a short drive from Hard Rock Cafe Cancun and provides free public parking on site. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. It provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a kids pool and a kids club. Those staying at the property can also hire a bicycle to explore Cancun and its surrounds. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe boasts convenient dining options, including Mediterranean and Italian dishes at La Luce and Mexican meals at Maxal. Eateries at the resort include Azulinda and Noriku. A selection of dining options are also available in the area. The resort is less than a 20-minute drive from Cancun International Airport and Iberostar Cancun Golf Course is a brief stroll away. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Cancun.HotelsCombined

name: Royalton CHIC Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort - Adults Only
address: Km 9.7 Blvd. Kukulcan, Zona Hotel, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Whether unwinding on our private white-sand beach or dancing with CHIC Angels at our Rooftop Cabana Lounge pool party, Royalton CHIC Cancun adults-only aged 18+, is where you can Party Your Way in the glimmering heart of downtown Cancun. Take in the breathtaking views of the impossibly beautiful Caribbean or mesmerizing sunsets over the Nichupté Lagoon from your stylish suite, then set out for an effervescent adventure in lively Mexico.Marriott

address: Boulevard Kukulkan, Km. 11.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Wyndham Alltra Cancun Resort offers a luxury base in Cancun and features a swimming pool, complimentary wireless internet and free private parking on-site. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The resort features a 24/7 reception, plus a kids club and a sun deck. Guests can try out the recreational facilities on offer, such as miniature golf, a playground and billiards. It also has its very own spa and wellness center, Aura Spa. Every contemporary room at Wyndham Alltra Cancun Resort comes with a refrigerator and cable/satellite channels, while the bathrooms offer showers and hair dryers. They all have a flat-screen TV, internet access and tea and coffee making facilities. Guests of Wyndham Alltra Cancun Resort are welcome to sample international cuisine at Ventanas, or try local and Asian dishes at Azul. Dining options at the resort include Café México and Viaggio. Other dining options are also available. For those who enjoy exploring local restaurants and cafés, there is a wide range right on the doorstep. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Cancun.HotelsCombined

name: Suites Malecon Cancun
address: Av. Bonampak Sm 6 M1 L1, 77503 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Only 10 minutes’ walk from Boulevard Kukulkan, Suites Malecon Cancun features panoramic views of Cancun city and Nichupté Lagoon. The property is in the same location as Américas Shopping Mall. The apartments are fully equipped and include ironing facilities, satellite channels in a flat-screen TV, safe, and terraces overlooking the lagoon and the city landscape. They are divided into seating area, dining area, well-equipped kitchen, bedroom and private bathroom with shower. Toiletries are provided. Las Américas Shopping Mall features several different restaurants that guests can explore, or they can also choose to prepare their own meals en suite. The complex has an infinity pool with a hot tub, BBQ facilities, plus sun terraces with beds and loungers. The facilities also offer a gym and a business centre. The International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive from the complex and Cancun’s town centre is 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Atelier Playa Mujeres
address: Lote 13, Rth-4, SM003, Mz.001, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel Atelier Playa Mujeres (adults only) is located right on a sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas free of charge. The town Cancun is around 14 km away (Playa del Carmen around 80 km, Tulum around 143 km). For mobility there is a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 28 km away. Amenities: The 5-storey beach hotel consists of a main building and an adjoining building, and has 429 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, 6 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop, theater, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 8 restaurants (air-conditioned). In a total 7 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service is free of charge. Room cleaning, laundry / ironing service, concierge service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area, sauna, solarium and massages available for a fee. Entertainment for adults: activity programme. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard, Visa and American Express. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla
address: Boulevard Kukulcan South North Km 12 5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla, a new, urban hotel beside the lagoon in Cancun hotel zone. Enjoy being steps from some of the best shopping brands, restaurants and white sand beaches. We will introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in. At Canopy, we have got you covered. Our Just-Right Rooms are comfortable, modern spaces with the amenities you want, like free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, murals from local artists and our exclusively designed Canopy beds. Deluxe rooms feature views of the ocean and double shower, while our suites include a living room, dining area, espresso/bar cart and hanging chair as well as signature Canopy bathrobe. Feel better going forward and fill up your bottles with filtered water on every floor. Welcome the day in the cafe with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Dine at Azulinda Cafe and Bar or head to the roof to sip cocktails, fresh juices or coffee al fresco. Enjoy the view while working out or relaxing poolside at our rooftop fitness center and outdoor pool. If there is business to be done, settle into our co-working space with comfortable seating and plenty of charging outlets. We also offer three boardrooms for meetings and events, and our beautiful terrace will accommodate up to 36 guests. Enjoy all Hilton Honors benefits at our Energizing hotel.Hilton

Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, separate living room, internet access – wireless, private pool. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site), golf course (within 3 km). description: Dreams Vista Cancun is an all-new, all ocean view, family resort! Set beachfront along the Caribbean Sea, there’s activities for the kid in everyone—a beautiful beach, four pools and watersports galore. The resort’s prime location is close to the wonders and ruins of the Mayan Riviera, and right next door to the Puerto Cancun Golf Club The brand new, modern rooms and suites at Dreams Vista Cancun all offer ocean views from a private, furnished balcony or terrace, an in-room mini-bar and more. Connecting rooms, family suites, and Sun Club upgrades are also available. All rooms and suites are non-smoking.WebBeds

name: Nizuc Resort and Spa
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 21 Punta Nizuc, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea, Nizuc Resort & Spa is located on the secluded Punta Nizuc and features an outdoor pool, private dock and spa. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are available to guests. The air-conditioned rooms offer Nespresso coffee makers and flat-screen TVs. The spacious bathrooms feature a bath tubs with rainfall showers. The 6 on-site restaurants serve modern Mexican dishes, Peruvian ceviches as well as Asian and Mediterranean food. Tours and activities can be arranged by the concierge. Nizuc Resort & Spa has event and meeting facilities. Guests can enjoy a variety of massages or treatments in the luxurious on-site spa. The Nizuc Thermal Experience is a feast to awaken the senses through a guided circuit of hydrotherapy. Laguna Nichupté can be reached 6.9 km. Cancun International Airport is a 10 minutes’ drive from Nizuc Resort & Spa. The center of Cancun can be reached within 25 minutes by car.

name: The Westin Cancun Resort Villas & Spa
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 20.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Plan an unforgettable getaway at The Westin Cancun Resort Villas & Spa. Tucked away between the Caribbean Sea and a peaceful lagoon, our beachfront vacation ownership resort offers the perfect destination for family vacations or getaways with friends. Unwind at one of the sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches at our Cancun beach resort. Soothe tired muscles after an exciting day of Cancun adventures with a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our Cancun villa resort's restaurants and bars. Recharge in a spacious ocean-view or lagoon-view villa with a balcony and fully equipped kitchen, or select a comfortable studio with views of the water. All accommodations include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Best of all, we do not charge resort or per person fees.Marriott

name: Hard Rock Hotel Cancun
address: Blvd Kukulcan KM 14.5, Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The property is located in Cancun's popular hotel zone. The resort sits on the beach looking out at the beautiful Caribbean Sea. The hotel is modern with beautiful pools, swim up bars and multiple lounges and restaurants. The resorts fine chefs create unique dining experiences for the entire family in our specialty restaurants, featuring a mix of International, Mexican, Asiatic, Italian, and a Steakhouse cuisines. Guests can spend the night dancing to one of our live DJ's. Not only the lavish spacious rooms and suite amenities include a double hydro spa tub, but you can enjoy the stunning ocean views from your private balcony. Customers can choose from one of the wonderful opportunities from the area: visiting the Pre-Colombian Tulum City, take a jungle tour, a thrilling ride on the AquaTwister, snorkelling, or just enjoy the wonderful sun set while sailing. Here, you have all the possibilities to feel the real bliss.FarePortal

description: The award-winning, adults-only Le Blanc Spa Palace is regarded by many as one of the best hotels in the world. Pure luxury and elegance meet an incredible location, more than 20,000 m2 between the Caribbean Sea and the Nichupté Lagoon, enjoying stunning views. The hotel offers an excellent spa, various exceptional restaurants and a wonderful infinity pool, making it the ideal place for an unforgettable stay. SMOKE FREE PROPERTYFarePortal

Downtown Cancun is about 10 km away; the International Airport can be reached within a 30-minute drive. The rooms are equipped to provide maximum comfort and offer the necessary amenities for an unforgettable stay. The restaurant is elegant, casual, classy and loaded - for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Contemporary International and Mexican specialties are served from impeccable and generous buffets that warm hearts and whet appetites.Ticket Package

address: Sm 307 Mz 334 Lt 04 - 02, 77560 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Cancún, 1.5 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is located 11 km from Beto Avila Stadium, 11 km from Cancun Government Palace and 12 km from Cancun Bus Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, the rooms at Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a balcony. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa offers a hot tub. La Isla Shopping Mall is 23 km from the hotel, while Universidad Anahuac Cancun is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 6 km from Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa.

description: The southeast part of Mexico is one of the most attractive and enriching areas of the country with different cities that have been transformed into ideal meeting points for travelers of all kinds. One of the most visited is Cancun and if in you are near future you are planning a quick visit, our hotel City Express Plus by Marriott Cancun Aeropuerto Riviera is the ideal option for your stay.On the other hand, if you have a couple of days off, do not hesitate to discover the wonders that Quintana Roo hosts. Only 15 minutes away, you will find the La Isla where you can enjoy a wide range of shopping and gastronomic options. If you want to enjoy a bit more and relax, you can discover the wonderful attractions of Xcaret and discover the Mayan world in a wonderful way. Among the various activities are walks through archaeological ruins, a trip on board a raft down the Rio del Paraiso and diving through the reefs.Marriott

description: Offering direct access to Cancún Beach, Live Aqua Cancun Beach Resort Cancun. Only features an outdoor swimming pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. It has attractive rooms with balconies, 9 restaurants, 5 bars and a spa. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at the Live Aqua Beach Resort Cancun has stylish décor with tiled floors. All rooms include a TV, coffee maker, aromatherapy products, a safety-deposit box and a minibar which is refilled daily. The stylish Siete Restaurant serves a range of Mexican cuisine, while European and Asian dishes are on offer in the mb Restaurant. The Azur serves international options set by the pool and overlooking the sea. The Aqua’s extensive spa offers hydrotherapy treatments, massage and aromatherapy. There are also hot tubs and steam baths. There is a gym available, while yoga classes are also available. Located in Cancún’s Hotel Zone, the Live Aqua is set next to Nichupte Lagoon and in front of the popular La Isla shopping centre. Please note this is an adults-only hotel.

address: Blvd Kukulkan, Km 5.5 Lote 6-C, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo

Wonderful amenities await guests: swimming pools, hot tub, sun terrace, spa, gym, steam bath and a long beach with warm waters. There are several themed restaurants and a buffet restaurant in the premises. There is a long list of activities for guests. Daytime entertainment for all ages (mini club for the kids), golf, and tennis courts, water sports, evening entertainment (shows and live music) for adults.FarePortal

name: Hotel Nyx Cancun All Inclusive
address: Blvd. Kukulkan, Manzana 52, Km 11.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Nestled on the beach, this Zona Hotelera property is within a 10-minute walk of Costa Occidental de Isla Mujeres National Park, La Isla Shopping Mall, and Cancun Interactive Aquarium. Cancun Convention Center and Chac Mool Beach are also within 2 mi (3 km).Expedia

name: Hotel Avenida Cancun
address: Avda. Lopez Portillo Super 60 Manzana 14 Lote 2, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The comfortable Hotel Avenida Cancun offers its guests facilities featuring free Wi-Fi throughout, free public parking on site and it is located in Cancun’s main avenue, having easy access to public transportation. The rooms at the hotel have a functional décor, cable TV, telephone and wake up services are available. The bathroom is private and comes with free toiletries. Within about 600 metres from Hotel Avenida Cancun guests will find several restaurants, or they can cross the street and find the local supermarket. The hotel also features lifts, room service and a 24 hour front desk. Cancun’s hotel zone is 15 minutes’ drive from Hotel Avenida Cancun, and the airport can be reached in a 20-minute drive.

name: Planet Hollywood Adult Scene Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort - Adults Only
address: Carretera a Punta Sam, SM006 Mza2, 84, Cancun, Q.R., Mexico, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Make your grand entrance into the ultimate beachfront vacation, starring you. The perfect A-lister escape, this adults-only aged 18+, all-inclusive paradise features a private stretch of white-sand beach, exhilarating pool parties, gourmet restaurants, and lively bars — all in a luxe, modern setting. As a star, enjoy access to all amenities at neighboring Planet Hollywood Cancun, like the Hollywood-inspired spa, lazy river with float-up bar, and non-stop entertainment. Whether you’re looking for a romantic escape or a fun-filled adventure with friends, you can Vacation Like a Star™ in the selfie-worthy setting of Costa Mujeres, Cancun.Marriott

And let's not forget the on-site amenities; a week is simply not enough time to sample them all. There are freshwater pools for adults and children, a full- service spa, fitness center, beach, terrace and villa massage service, tennis courts with floodlighting for evening play, two restaurants and a snack bar, to name just a few. As an added benefit, guests are allowed access to amenities at all our Royal resorts in the Cancun area, with a free shuttle service between them. The beautiful villa sleeps 6 people and has a full kitchen and two balconies. address: Carr. Cancun-Aeropuerto Mz. 4 L. 5 Sm. 301, 77560 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Comfort Inn Cancún Aeropuerto is 5 minutes’ drive from Cancun International Airport and offers a free airport shuttle from the airport to the hotel (one way). There is a 24-hour front desk, free WiFi and free parking. Bright, modern rooms at the Cancún Aeropuerto Hotel are air conditioned and have flat-screen cable TV. Decorated in orange and white, they come with a safe, work desk and coffee maker. There is a hairdryer in the bathroom. Guests can enjoy a meal in the hotel’s restaurant. Room service is also available. The tour desk can offer information on the local area. Cancun centre is a 10-minute drive away and Parque Nizuc Waterpark is within a 20-minute drive.

name: Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa
address: Vialidad Paseo Mujeres, Manzana 1, Lote 10, SM 3, Cancun, Mexico, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: A sauna, an outdoor pool and 5-star accommodation are on offer at Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa. It provides a gym, as well as massage services, a kids club and a playground. Rooms at Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa are comfortable and provide a mini bar. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Cancun International Airport is a 55-minute drive from Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa. The resort's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has an enjoyable stay.HotelsCombined

name: Mayan Monkey Cancun
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 9.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Cancún, 200 metres from Playa Chac Mool, Mayan Monkey Cancun features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hostel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen. At the hostel the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Mayan Monkey Cancun can enjoy an American breakfast. Guests can enjoy playing table tennis or sing karaoke, or take advantage of the business centre. Staff speak English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa Gaviota Azul, Playa Forum and Cancun Convention Center. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 21 km from Mayan Monkey Cancun, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Adhara Hacienda Cancun
address: Av. Carlos Nader, Lotes 1,2,3, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: In the heart of Cancun, a short walk from popular sites, this hotel provides free shuttle service to the beach along with on-site dining options and many modern amenities. The Adhara Hacienda Cancun is located in a residential area of Cancun. Tulum Avenue, the financial district and a number of shopping centres are easily accessible. Beautiful beaches, offering a variety of leisure activities are also only a short shuttle ride away. Thoughtful amenities at the Adhara Hacienda Cancun include free Wi-Fi and a gift shop. Guests can also take advantage of the on-site fitness centre, complete with an outdoor swimming pool. Guests at the Adhara Hacienda Cancun can also enjoy on-site dining at Adhara Grill, serving Mexican and international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Sina Suites
address: Quetzal 33 Club de Golf, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Suites Sina offers a private beach and a swimming pool, along with rooms with direct pool access. This traditional property is conveniently situated in Hotel Zone. This 3-star hotel offers a kids pool, an express check-in and check-out feature and a sun deck. Couples on a romantic getaway will enjoy the hotel's features like a turndown service and honeymoon suites. Sina provides 36 air conditioned rooms. There are also several rooms available for families. The area around Sina Suites has a variety of cafés and restaurants. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Cancun.Revato

address: Calle 112 Este, SM 84, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring a year-round outdoor pool, Casa Caribe Cancun in Cancún provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. Each unit features a balcony, a kitchen with a microwave, a dining area and a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a bath or shower and free toiletries. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. A continental breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. The restaurant at Casa Caribe Cancun serves local cuisine. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Puerto Juarez Beach, Playa Blanca and Gran Puerto Cancún. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 21 km from Casa Caribe Cancun, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Westin Lagunamar Ocean Resort Villas & Spa, Cancun
address: Km 12.5 Boulevard Kukulcan, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Find the perfect getaway at The Westin Lagunamar Ocean Resort Villas & Spa, Cancun in Mexico. Situated on the Caribbean Sea in the Cancun Hotel Zone, the studio and villa rentals at our beachfront vacation ownership resort boast endless amenities designed to make your stay exceptional. Explore popular Cancun attractions such as Tulum, Chichén Itza and more from our resort. Go for a swim in our infinity pool, spend the day on our white-sand beach, indulge at our spa or play a round of kid-friendly mini golf. Satisfy your vacation cravings at our resort restaurants or relax poolside and let us bring snacks and drinks right to you. If you've come to Mexico for a wedding, let our team make planning your event a success in an outdoor space on the beach and with our custom catering services. At the end of the day, settle into your Cancun vacation rental featuring a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony with ocean views. We look forward to welcoming you to our family-friendly Cancun beach resort in Mexico.Marriott

name: Courtyard by Marriott Cancun Airport
address: Blvd. Luis Donaldo Colosio, Km. 12.5, Lot 1, SMZA. 301, 77560 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Appreciate comfort and convenience when booking accommodations at Courtyard Cancun Airport. Located in one of Mexico's most vibrant cities, our hotel is just 3 miles from Cancun International Airport and offers a complimentary shuttle to and from the transportation hub. Enjoy visiting the Mayan Ruins of Tulum, Riviera Maya, Playa Delfines, Parque de las Palapas and Punta Nizuc while here. Following a full day of sightseeing or conducting business, escape to your spacious room featuring luxury bedding, free high-speed Wi-Fi and an ergonomic workstation. Order room service and treat yourself to authentic Mexican cuisine any time from El Henequen, our on-site international restaurant. You can also relax with an evening cocktail in our lobby bar. During downtime, get in a workout at our fitness center and take a relaxing swim in our outdoor pool. Host an impressive work or social event in one of our versatile meeting spaces. You'll have everything you need for a relaxing stay at Courtyard Cancun Airport.Marriott

name: Corales Suites
address: Ave Javier Rojo Gomez Smza 2 Mza 13 Lt 1-4, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Puerto Morelos, 100 metres from Playa Puerto Morelos, Corales Suites offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a terrace. The property is around 30 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, 36 km from ADO International Bus Station and 37 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The hotel also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms come with a kitchen fitted with a fridge. Beto Avila Stadium is 38 km from the hotel, while Cancun Government Palace is 38 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 26 km from Corales Suites.

name: Hacienda Morelos Beach Front Hotel
address: Av Rafael East Melgar Lote 5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Situated right on the beach in Punto Morelos, this luxurious hotel comes with rooms sea views. Hotel Hacienda Morelos is just a 40-minute drive from Cancun. Each room at this tropical hotel comes with air conditioning. The bathrooms are private and include a shower and toilet. The hotel features a fully stocked on-site bar, and guests will find a range of restaurants in the area, many within only 200 metres. Guests can arrange activities like snorkelling and diving with agencies located within 1 km of the property, and the ancient ruins of Tulum are only 95 km away. Playa del Carmen, where guests will find shopping and sightseeing, is a 30-minute drive from Hotel Hacienda Morales.

name: Arrecifes Suites
address: Calle Heriberto Frias SM 2 Mz 14 Lote 7, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring a year-round outdoor pool, Arrecifes Suites in Puerto Morelos provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. Every unit features a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a microwave. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. Arrecifes Suites has a garden for your convenience, along with a private beach area. Playa Puerto Morelos is a few steps from the accommodation, while Cancun Underwater Museum is 30 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 26 km from Arrecifes Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Crown Paradise Club Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 18.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located along the Caribbean Sea, this Cancun hotel is 3.5 km from Aqua World Marina. It features a water park with 8 water slides and The Spa offers hair and body treatments. Every spacious room offers balcony with beautiful ocean views and air conditioning. All rooms are brightly decorated and include a satellite TV, refrigerator and coffee maker. Guests can enjoy a poolside massage or relax in the hot tubs. A gym and 2 tennis courts are available for active guests. Crown Paradise Cancun offers free on-site activities, such as a mini-golf course and game room with billiards. A variety of cuisine is available at Club Cancun’s 7 restaurants, including Japanese specialties at Fujiyama and Italian dishes at La Piazza. Beer and cocktails are served at 6 bars, such as Club Caribe Pool Bar and Beach Bar.

name: Eco-Hotel El Rey Del Caribe
address: Avenida Uxmal 24 Manzana 3, Lote 18, Supermanzana 2-A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This eco hotel is located 100 metres from Cancún Town Centre and 200 metres from the Historia de México Monument. It features a hot tub, sun terrace with swimming pool and a garden. The studio offers contemporary décor, air conditioning, ceiling fan, safety box, cable TV and a kitchenette with kitchenware and minibar. The bathrooms come with shower, and free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. Guests at Eco-hotel El Rey del Caribe will get a 10% off at the Playa Cabana Beach Club’s restaurant serving international dishes. The on-site restaurant is only opened for breakfast. Among these amenities, this eco hotel features solar water heaters, recycling of waste and rainwater catchment. Eco-hotel El Rey del Caribe is 2 km from Cancún Beach and 2.5 km from the Isla Mujeres Ferry. El Meco Archaeological Site is 3 km away and Cancún International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Sky Inn Cancun
address: Avenida Coba sm 36 lt 1 Mz 2, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 1.6 km from Beto Avila Stadium and less than 1 km from the centre, Sky Inn Cancun offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a fitness centre. The apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and walk-in shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. The restaurant at Sky Inn Cancun serves Mexican cuisine. A a children's playground is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Cancun Government Palace is 2.3 km from Sky Inn Cancun, while Cancun Bus Station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 17 km from the apartment.

name: Hotel Bonampak
address: Av. Bonampak #225, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Well situated in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Bonampak offers free WiFi throughout the property, an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star hotel offers a garden. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.8 km from Playa Las Perlas. At the hotel every room includes air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units feature a safety deposit box. Speaking English and Spanish, staff are always on hand to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Hotel Bonampak include Cancun Government Palace, Beto Avila Stadium and Cancun Bus Station. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: City Express Junior by Marriott Cancun
address: Avenida Nichupté SM 8 MZ 1, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: City Express Junior by Marriott Cancun is situated right next door to the popular shopping mall, Plaza Las Americas. Our hotel is the perfect choice for your trip to the gorgeous Mexican Caribbean. Make the most of your visit, and take some time to check out Cancun's many tourist attractions. We recommend a guided tour of the ruins in Chichen Itza, one of the largest Mayan ruins. Or soak up the sun on a boat ride to Isla Mujeres, a tropical island with white sandy beaches and massive coral reefs. If you're feeling adventurous, take a trip to one of our underground lakes (cenotes). Go scuba diving or snorkelling in crystal clear water and see the colourful sea creatures that live just below the surface. For a break from the heat, duck into Plaza Las Americas or Plaza La Peninsula and explore the shops and restaurants. And after the sun goes down, get ready to experience Cancun's exciting nightlife.Dance the night away at one of the most popular dance clubs Coco Bongo.Marriott

name: Wyndham Grand Cancun All Inclusive Resort & Villas
address: Blvd. Kukulkan, L-48 KM. 16.5 M.53, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: On the East Coast of the Yucatan Peninsula on Cancun Islands 12 mile stretch of powdery white sands the Omni Cancun Hotel and Villas is located directly on the beach about halfway down on the Caribbean side of the Cancun Island. The Omni is close to all activities yet removed from the hustle and bustle of Punta Cancun. Just 15 minutes from the Cancun International Airport we are within walking distance to water sports and the islands newest golf course.FarePortal

name: Lol-Ha Hotel Boutique
address: Jesús Martínez Ross SM307 MZ344 LT1, 77560 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Cancún, 2 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, LOL-HA Hotel Boutique features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property features an outdoor pool and is set 11 km from Beto Avila Stadium. At the hotel, rooms include a desk. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at LOL-HA Hotel Boutique have pool view. At the accommodation, rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. An American breakfast is available each morning at LOL-HA Hotel Boutique. Cancun Government Palace is 12 km from the hotel, while Cancun Bus Station is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 7 km from LOL-HA Hotel Boutique.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Cancun Hotel Zone
address: Blvrd. Kukulcan Lt. 1-02 Zona Hotelera Km. 23.5 MZ60, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set a pace that suits you at Residence Inn Cancun Hotel. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. With a location in Cancun's hotel zone area within the Nizuc channel reserve, surrounded by nature, just 9 km away from the Airport. Enjoy complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi and connect to work and the outside world. Work up a sweat in our hotel's fitness center, ready for strengthening body and mind. Relax and unwind when you want. Thrive at our extended-stay hotel with the conveniences you need, like pet-friendly studios, one- and two-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. Take advantage of Cancun's bounteous produce in your hotel room's fully equipped kitchen, ready for your favorite cuisine. At Residence Inn, we welcome you to Mexico with open arms. Pets are allowed at our hotel too, so everyone in your family is welcome.Marriott

name: Bok21
address: Av. Bonampak Sm. 4 Mz 03 Lote 20, 21 Y 22, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated conveniently in Cancún, BOK21 offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel features family rooms. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. Rooms come complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while certain units at BOK21 also have a seating area. The units will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine. The accommodation offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near BOK21 include Cancun Government Palace, Cancun Bus Station and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 16 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun's hotel zone, next to one of the city's most beautiful beaches, this property offers enjoyable facilities and luxurious spa services with great views of Nichupte Lagoon. The family-friendly resort of Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun consists of 3 main buildings, each sheltered by a palapa. Go swimming in the outdoor pool or spend the day at the beach. The hotel offers several eating options, including Argentinian dishes in San Telmo, Trattoria and Pizzeria offering typical Italian classics, Sushi Corner, Cantina offering the Mexican flavour, The Grill to enjoy your meals while also enjoying the outdoor view, a children's option at the Pirate Ship and for the adults La Cevichería, where they can snack and sip a refreshing beverage while watching their kids play. The Deli & Gift Shop is a relaxing corner where guests can enjoy a cup of coffee, a pastry and a good book. The Fiesta Americana's Miiluma Spa offers massage and beauty treatments. There is also a modern gym, and yoga classes are offered.

name: The Grand at Moon Palace Cancun
address: Carretera Cancun-Chetumal Km. 36.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: They say transcendence is rising above something to a superior state, it’s that precise moment where reality gets suspended and you’re in the moment, but the moment doesn’t define you—you have broken through boundaries. That’s the spirit that courses through our luxurious accommodations and villas. Ease into pure relaxation and bliss with complimentary Wi-Fi, free phone calls, smart TV, a bottle of wine upon arrival, double whirlpool tub, 24-hour room service. You don’t simply enter one of our suites—you get swept away by the possibilities. RESORT CREDIT: A WORTHY EXCUSE TO SPOIL OUR GUESTS It’s not just another day in paradise, it could mean $1,500. Stay 5-8 nights and make your stay even more magical with $1,500 to indulge in primping and pampering at the spa, championship golf, exotic tours, romantic dinners, scuba diving, and swimming with dolphins, wedding collections, and more. Accrue more credit when you stay longer. Make the most of The Grand experience with resort credit and relish deeper levels of extravagance. Important note: Please let us know if you would like to request for a different room/accommodation so we can check it's availability. Please note that prices may change depending on the room you would request.VRBO

address: Avenida Tulum, MZ 1, Lote 2, SM 12, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: In an atmosphere of classic timeless style right in Cancún’s growing financial and shopping district, step into the serene and safe environment of Four Points by Sheraton Cancún Centro where our guests can enjoy comfortable amenities, relaxing accommodations, and productive workspaces. Our family-friendly hotel in Cancún is conveniently located close to hospitals, specialty clinics, universities, and shopping centers. Seeking an authentic local experience downtown, it is perfect for exploring the local area with passion, just 20 minutes away from the hotel zone and the Caribbean Sea beaches. Our easy interior connection to the awarded in the field of health at Galenia Hospital, find a sanctuary in our large rooms and plush bedding. We pride ourselves on superior service, an inviting atmosphere, and a host of thoughtful amenities created to satisfy the corporate and leisure traveler. Maintain your balance at our 24/7 fitness center, and unwind in our beautiful outdoor pool and pool terrace.Marriott

Each modern, air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a microwave, as well as a minibar. There is also a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms include other amenities such as a sewing kit, iron and coffee maker. This hotel offers a cafeteria and a restaurant, and the pool area has showers and toilets. Guests can request tourist information at the 24- hour reception. Cancun International Airport is 18 km away.

This has 3 swimming pools, one for adults, one for families and one for children with water slides and water games. It has a gym at an additional cost. Inside the property, there are Mayan ruins. Just at 2.5 km away is the most important night-life area of Cancun and 800 meters away is the supermarket. This property offers a wide range of packages of food and beverages that can be paid at the reception of the hotel where the condominium is located. This property also has one of the top-rated locations in Cancún! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. This property is also rated for the best value in Cancún! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city. We speak your language!

name: Hotel Maria de Lourdes
address: Ave. Yaxchilan 80 A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and restaurant, Hotel Maria de Lourdes is set in the centre of Cancún and 1 km from the beaches surrounding Puerto Juárez. It offers free parking and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Each room at the Maria de Lourdes has simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have air conditioning and cable TV. Guests can enjoy a range of Mexican and international cuisine in the Maria de Lourdes’ restaurant. There is also a bar set in a traditional Palapa thatched hut. The famous Mayan ruins at Tulum can be reached in 1.5 hours by car. Cancún International Airport is just 17 km away.

name: Dreams Sands Cancun Resort and Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan km. 8.5 Lote B, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated upon a white-sand beach in the heart of Cancun's hotel zone, Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa is also 10 minutes' drive from the city centre. Guests are offered with gourmet dining, bars and nightlife entertainment, plus 2 swimming pools. The elegantly decorated rooms offer stunning views of the Caribbean Sea and Isla Mujeres. They include a full, spacious bathroom with luxury toiletries, a daily stocked minibar that offers beers, soft drinks and bottled water, and amenities including an iPod dock. Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa boasts an equipped spa and fitness centre, and for children's amusement there is the Explorer's Club. The resort also features an outdoor hot tub, plus non-motorized water sports activities can be arranged by the Dreams Entertainment team. Guests will be able to choose between 9 different restaurant options, all offering gourmet cuisine. Four festive bars and lounges will serve a wide menu of unlimited top-shelf spirits. Guests can also perfect their swing at a nearby golf course with complimentary greens fees. Cancun International Airport can be reached in a 25-minute drive. Family friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 8.5. Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Mayafair Design Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Cancun. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are on the list of things guests can enjoy. address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Manzana 51, Lote 7, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This stunning beachfront resort is set on the beautiful strip of Punta Cancun and framed by the Caribbean Sea, where you can enjoy a white sand beach and clear-blue waters. All rooms at Hyatt Ziva Cancún include a flat-screen TV, mini bar and a coffee machine. Rooms feature a private bathroom equipped with a shower as well as bath robes and slippers. Hyatt Ziva Cancun offers a variety of activities, from theater shows to water sports to tequila tastings and a microbrewery. Choose to lounge in a beach cabana, sip a margarita and enjoy diving, snorkeling, sailing, and swimming in the Caribbean. Soak up the sun at cascading pools overlooking the sea, including the pool bar. Enjoy the oceanfront spa, with a massage, holistic body treatments, hydrotherapy and a fitness center. Hyatt Ziva Cancun is located 300 metres from Coco Bongo while La Isla Shopping Mall is 3.4 km away. Cancun International Airport is 17 km away.

description: Visit paradise at The Westin Resort & Spa, Cancun. Just six miles from CUN Airport, our Cancun Quintana Roo resort is a short ride to the aquarium, museums, waterparks, Isla Mujeres and water activities. Unwind at one of our sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches then schedule a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Find adventure with a snorkeling trip to the coral reef or other activities. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our on-site restaurants and bars. If you're in Mexico for a conference or family gathering, take advantage of our indoor venues, custom catering, planning services and event spaces. Kick back in a comfortable guest room or suite with views of the water. All rooms include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Marriot Cancun Resort features numerous water recreational activities and an on-site tour desk.

description: Set on a beautiful beach in the Riviera Maya, Rancho Sakol is 25 minutes' walk or 10 minutes' by bike from the center of Puerto Morelos. This charming Inn offers free use of bikes and snorkelling equipment. Rooms at Rancho Sakol have authentic Mexican-style décor and a balcony or terrace with views of the sea or gardens. Each room features a ceiling fan and a private bathroom with a shower. You can enjoy a free self-service breakfast each morning, including coffee, fresh fruit, cereal, breads and yoghurt. You can also cook eggs to your liking and squeeze your own orange juice. Rancho's central palapa area features terraces overlooking the ocean and an indoor sand area with an adult-size swing as well as free Wi-Fi. The popular resorts of Playa del Carmen and Cancun are both a 30-minute drive away, while Cancun International Airport is just a 25-minute drive away. Free private parking is available at the Rancho.

The private bathroom includes a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Dining options range from traditional Asian specialties at The Sushi Bar to Mediterranean cuisine at Fantino. Indoor or outdoor dining is available and cocktails are served at the Lobby Lounge. Just 20-minutes from Cancun International Airport, the Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski can arrange airport and area attraction transportation. Aquaworld, offering boat trips, is 2 km away.

Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony. The bed and breakfast offers a continental or American breakfast. The restaurant at Cancun Hostel specialises in American, seafood and local cuisine. The accommodation offers a picnic area. Guests can also relax in the garden, beside the outdoor swimming pool, or in the shared lounge area. Beto Avila Stadium is 3.4 km from Cancun Hostel, while Cancun Government Palace is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 17 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Villa Antilope
address: Calle Antilope SM 20 MZ 12 Lote 13, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located 1.3 km from Beto Avila Stadium and 1.7 km from Cancun Government Palace in the centre of Cancún, Villa Antilope provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. A balcony with garden view, a cable flat-screen TV and air conditioning are provided in some units. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Villa Antilope offers a picnic area. Guests can also relax in the garden, beside the outdoor swimming pool, or on the sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cancun Bus Station, Cristo Rey Church and Cancun Culture Center. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 17 km from Villa Antilope, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ventus at Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort
address: Blvd. El Cid Mz20 Lt 1-01,Unidad 11 Sm03, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Ventus at Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort is the next generation of the El Cid Family of resorts, offering exceptional service and singular attention to detail in a luxury setting promising the perfect vacation escape. Experience breathtaking surroundings, elegantly styed rooms and world class cuisine that makes for an unforgettable getaway. Indulge yourself with oceanfront accommodations and Platinum Club Level service including personalized check-in, private butler, special in-room amenities and use of an exclusive lounge with VIP services.FarePortal

name: Dreams Sapphire Resort & Spa
address: Super Manzana 11, Manzana 9, Lote 10, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This outstanding award-winning resort has a privileged location, situated on a wonderful landscape and offering a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea. The property is set in Puerto Morelos, a famous fishing village located at only 35km from Cancun, where visitors can find multiple leisure options such as exciting excursions and water activities as well as a wide range of restaurants and cafes. This hotel offers a world of luxury to its guests with spacious and elegant rooms equipped with a private balcony or a terrace and a complimentary mini-bar refreshed daily with soft drinks and bottled water. Travellers will find unlimited activities for their entertainment as well as a spa offering the most advanced treatments. Guests can choose between six different restaurants offering a huge variety of international cuisine and various bars and lounges where they can taste a delicious cocktail.FarePortal

name: Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun, Gourmet All Inclusive by Karisma
address: Carretera Cancun Puerto Morelos km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos on Bahia Petempich Beach, this 5-star resort features a renowned Gourmet Inclusive service, contemporary Caribbean-style suites, all of them including a hot tub, plus a full-service spa. It also boasts 3 outdoor pools. Every suite at the Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun offers a canopy bed, air conditioning and a balcony overlooking the ocean or gardens. The minibar is stocked daily, plus a coffee maker is included. The elegant bathrooms provide deluxe bathrobes, rain showers, marbled double sinks and a hairdryer. The Gourmet Inclusive service includes 6 different restaurants and bars. The casual-elegant restaurants offer author cuisine, which features unique courses designed by a renowned chef; world cuisine, Italian, Caribbean, Mexican. The bars include a place specialized in mojitos, cantina-style venues and a lounge serving international drinks. Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun also offers meeting and banquet facilities that can host up to 200 guests are also part of this resort's facilities. The 13,000-square-foot Vassa Spa and health club provides a fully-equipped gym and 18-foot rock climbing tower. A variety of classes are available at the resort including cooking, dancing and yoga.

name: Cancun Bay Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With breathtaking views of Mujeres Bay, Cancun Bay Resort features a beachfront pool and relaxation pool, tennis courts and a hot tub with a bar. It is located near several of Cancun's restaurants, shops and entertainment venues. Cancun International Airport is 20 minutes' drive away and Cancun's commercial area can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Each room and suite at the resort has a private balcony or terrace with views of the lagoon, garden or sea.FarePortal

name: Selina Cancun Downtown
address: Av. Tulum nº 75, Sm. 22, Mz. 26, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Cancun hotel is less than 200 yards from ADO bus station. Tour information and guest rooms provide free Wi-Fi. The local bus station offers transportation to Cancun International Airport every 30 minutes. Selina Cancun is within walking distance from local restaurants.

name: Hotel Marina El Cid Spa
address: Boulevard el Cid Unidad 15, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This Quintana Roo hotel overlooks the Puerto Morelos National Reef Park. It features a full-service spa, full-service marina, a 22,000 square foot pool and an on-site travel company. Each suite at the Hotel Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort Cancun Riviera Maya is furnished with a minibar, coffee maker and provides satellite TV. Guests will also find a hairdryer, ironing facilities and a work desk in each suite. Four restaurants are available at the Hotel Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort. Mediterranean, casual international, Mexican and seafood dishes are offered at the hotel. The Hotel Marina Beach Resort contains a convention center and a gym. The outdoor pool features water slides and rock formations. An adults-only pool is also on site. El Cid Spa Hotel Marina & Beach Resort is less than one mile from the charming, bohemian fishing village of Puerto Morelos. It is 30 minutes from Playa del Carmen.

name: Hotel Parador
address: Av. Tulum No. 26, Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Parador is located 20 metres from Reforma Park and 50 metres from the Handcraft Market. It features a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms offer modern décor, a wardrobe and flat-screen cable TV. The bathrooms are private and come with a shower. Guests at this hotel can enjoy Indian food served from 09:00 to 22:00 hours. Hotel Parador also has an on-site bar, Los Aluxes, that opens from 11:00 to 03:00 hours. Hotel Parador is 10 minutes’ drive from the beach and 15 minutes’ drive from Cancún International Airport.

name: Hacienda de Castilla
address: Calle 17, Sm. 64, Mza. 23, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is just 5 minutes’ drive from Playa Blanca Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. There is a 24-hour reception desk and free private parking. All rooms at Hacienda de Castilla include cable TV and a private bathroom with toiletries. The La Hija de Villa bar-restaurant serves Mexican cuisine. Here, guests can also enjoy sporting events and live entertainment. The Mandala Beach Club is a 20-minute drive away and offers loungers, tables and parasols. Hotel guests receive discounts on food and drinks. Puerto Juarez Harbour is about 10 minutes’ drive away and offers ferries to Isla Mujeres. Cancún International Airport is 30 minutes’ drive away. A shuttle service is available at an additional cost.

name: Oh! Cancun - The Urban Oasis
address: Av Tulum Esquina Brisa SM 4 Colonia Centro, Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Oh! - The Urban Oasis is located in Cancún. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free WiFi is offered and free private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV, private bathroom, and free toiletries. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. Some units include views of the pool or city. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers car hire. Cancun Government Palace is 600 metres from Oh! - The Urban Oasis, while Cancun Bus Station is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 14 km away.

name: Moloch Hostel & Suites
address: 54 Margaritas MZ. 25, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 200 metres from Cancun Bus Station, Moloch Hostel & Suites offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Cancun Government Palace, and within 2.3 km of the city centre. The units in the inn are fitted with a computer. Certain rooms also offer a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a minibar. All guest rooms at Moloch Hostel & Suites feature air conditioning and a desk. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cristo Rey Church, Parque las Palapas and Cancun Culture Center. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 18 km from Moloch Hostel & Suites.

name: Hotel Kavia
address: Calle Claveles Lt 07 09 Mz 4 SM 22, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Ideally set in Cancún, Hotel Kavia features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool and to a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room has a safety deposit box, while some rooms also boast a patio. All rooms have a wardrobe. At Hotel Kavia you will find a restaurant serving American cuisine. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cancun Government Palace, Cancun Bus Station and Beto Avila Stadium. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 17 km from Hotel Kavia.

name: Terracaribe Hotel
address: Av. Lopez Portillo # 70, 77564 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Just 2 minutes from the ferry port for Isla Mujeres, this downtown Cancún hotel features a large outdoor pool with sun deck. Each air conditioned room at the Terracaribe Hotel Boutique is decorated in a Mediterranean style. Cable TV is available in every room. Terracaribe Hotel has a cafeteria with hours from 07:00 am to 11:00 am

name: Casa de Ana - Habitación privada
address: Calle 31 N, Sm 72, M 3 lote 13, casa 203, 77510 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Apartment Ocean Front Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkán Km 18.7, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor and sun terrace, this Apartment Ocean Front Cancun is situated in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region. 1.3 km from Coco Bongo. There is a water park on site and guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. La Isla Shopping Mall is 2.8 km away. Free private parking is available on site. The apartment is air conditioned and has a TV with cable channels. Some units have a dining area and/or terrace. There is also a kitchenette, equipped with an oven, microwave and toaster. A refrigerator and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. There is a private bathroom with a shower in every unit. Towels are featured. Apartment Ocean Front Cancun also includes a spa centre and offers massage treatments. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. You can play tennis and table tennis at the property, and the area is popular for snorkeling. Cancun Government Palace is 7 km from Apartment Ocean Front Cancun, while Cancun Bus Station is 8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 16 km from Apartment Ocean Front Cancun.

name: Hotel Xbalamque and Spa
address: Av. Yaxchilan No. 31, Centro, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in central Cancun, the Hotel Xbalamqué Resort & Spa features Mayan-style décor, an outdoor pool, and spa. Every air-conditioned room at the Hotel Xbalamqué Resort & Spa provides cable TV. Hotel Xbalamqué includes an on-site bar "4 Elementos" which offers drinks and snacks with available room service. Tour information and car rentals are also available at the hotel, while safes and WiFi are available at reception. Cancun’s ADO Bus Station is just 500 metres from the Xbalamqué Resort & Spa. The Hotel Zone is a 5-minute drive away, while Cancún International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Suites Gaby
address: Av. Sunyaxchen Lote 46 Y 47 Mza 2, 77509 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in central Cancun, Hotel Suites Gaby offers free parking and air-conditioned rooms with plasma-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Each room at the Gaby Hotel Suites features a private bathrooms and a laptop safe. Work desks and closets are also included. Hotel Suites Gaby has an on-site restaurant, La Tortuga. The bilingual staff at reception can provide information about Cancun. Local and international restaurants, bars and lively nightclubs can be found in the surrounding streets. The famous Mercado 28 craft market is also nearby. Cancun's Hotel Zone is a 15-minute drive or taxi ride from the Gaby Hotel. El Meco Mayan ruins are within a short drive of the hotel, while Cancun International Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Temptation Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulcan K.M. 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Catering to free-spirited travelers (21+), Temptation Cancun Resort is the ideal hotspot for fun in the sun by day, and sexy signature themed parties by night, all surrounded by a fun, empowering atmosphere, allowing you to feel sexy, free, and uninhibited.jetBlue

name: Nirvana Hotel & Hostel - Cancun Hotel Zone
address: Av. Pok Ta Pok, Lote 4, Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property offers a restaurant where you can get breakfast, lunch and dinner. - Cancun Hotel Zone is situated in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region, 5 km from La Isla Shopping Mall. Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone 5 minutes driving to the Mandala beach club. Some rooms have views of the lake or garden. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom and hygine products. Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone features free WiFi throughout the property. A convenience store, and laundry services can be find on site. The hostel also offers a tour and activities desk. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Coco Bongo is 2 km from Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone, while Cancun Downtown is 7 km from the property. Cancun International Airport is 15 km away.

name: Ocean View Cancun Arenas
address: Blvd Kukulkan Km 2.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Steps from the beach, in Cancun's Hotel Zone, surrounded by gardens, nightclubs and restaurants, this hotel offers many meal options with 3 on-site restaurants and has free wireless internet access. Ocean View Cancun Arenas features an outdoor pool with daily activities and nightly entertainment. Guests can relax with a drink from the poolside snack bar or workout in the fitness center. After a day spent at the beach, visitors can relax on their private balcony or terrace. Guests at the Cancun Arenas Holiday Inn will appreciate a variety of restaurant options ranging from casual to fine dining. Arenas buffet-style restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Visitors can choose from beachfront dinning in Ocean Grill Tequila or fine Italian cuisine in Diletto.

name: Hotel Calypso Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 4, Lote D-8, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Calypso Cancun is located between the Nichupte Lagoon and the Caribbean Sea, and features an on-site restaurant as well as a tobacco shop. This Cancun hotel features 2 fresh water pools, and an on-site cocktail lounge. Each guest room at the Hotel Calypso Cancun offers a work desk, bathroom amenities, and cable TV. The Calypso Hotel Cancun, also features a guest laundry facility and on premise car rental. The hotel is located 100 meters off the beaches of Cancun and 25 minutes from the airport. Rate does not include eco tax of $72.62 MXN (approximately $3.90 USD) per room per night, must be paid upon arrival.

name: Desire Resort & Spa Riviera Maya - Couples Only
address: Carretera Puerto Morelos Km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This attractive hotel lies directly beside the beach and is just 15 minutes' walk from the centre of Puerto Morelos. Guests will discover many shopping and entertainment venues. Transfer to Cancún International Airport takes about 20 minutes. This luxury hotel offers a fabulous pool and garden complex. Additionally there is a hairdresser's salon, cosy bar and an air-conditioned restaurant. Room and laundry services are additionally available for use and there are parking facilities to be found outside the hotel. Each of the tastefully decorated apartments comes with a bathroom, a telephone, Internet access and a hire safe. In the outdoor complex is a freshwater swimming pool as well as a furnished sun terrace for guests to take advantage of. Furthermore, there is an indoor swimming pool, a sauna and a gym available for use.FarePortal

name: Pa´Xa Mama Hotel Boutique
address: Tulum Avenue 119, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Providing free WiFi, Pa´Xa Mama Hotel Boutique offers accommodation in Cancún, less than 1 km from Cancun Government Palace. Well set in the Downtown Cancun district, the property is located a 17-minute walk from Cancun Bus Station and 2 km from Beto Avila Stadium. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. All units have a wardrobe. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help guests with any queries that they may have. Coco Bongo is 11 km from Pa´Xa Mama Hotel Boutique, while La Isla Shopping Mall is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Dreams Jade Resort & Spa
address: Unidad 26, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set right on a stunning sandy beach and surrounded by a beautiful landscape of crystal blue waters, this spectacular holiday resort offers a unique experience of complete luxury on the Mexican coast. The complex is situated at just a 10-minute drive away from Puerto Morelos and lies between the city of Cancun and Playa del Carmen. The guest rooms are fitted with a beautiful Mediterranean decoration and top-notch amenities such as a private balcony, free Internet access and an iPod docking station. When it comes for dining, travellers can choose between different culinary options including local and international dishes. There is also a great selection of bars and lounges where visitors may taste some delicious drinks. The hotel offers a wide range of entertainment venues for all ages, including a kids' club, activities for teens, game courts and a spa where guests may indulge themselves with the latest treatments.FarePortal

name: Hotel Laurel Cancún Centro
address: 8 C. Laurel, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Laurel Cancún Centro offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has a restaurant, and Puerto Juarez Beach is 3 km away. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Hotel Laurel Cancún Centro can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cancun Bus Station, Cancun Government Palace and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 18 km from Hotel Laurel Cancún Centro.

name: Dna Cancun Hotel Y Posada
address: 61 Calle 19 Norte Lt 14, 77524 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Cancún, 1.7 km from Puerto Juarez Beach and 3.7 km from the centre, DNA Cancun Hotel y Posada features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and an outdoor swimming pool. Fitted with a patio, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near DNA Cancun Hotel y Posada include Cancun Bus Station, Cancun Government Palace and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Capital O Cancun Ocean View
address: Calle 15 #39, Smz 64, Mz 22, Lote 5, 77524 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in the heart of Cancun, the hotel boasts an accessible setting and is within walking distance of Cancun Bus Station. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a concierge and a swimming pool. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Capital O Cancun Ocean View, including a tour desk, a terrace and luggage storage. There is free private parking nearby for those with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a hair dryer, cable/satellite channels and a refrigerator. They each have an in-room closet, a private bathroom and a ceiling fan. Guests staying at Capital O Cancun Ocean View can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. The hotel is less than a 35-minute drive from Cancun International Airport. Hard Rock Cafe Cancun and Playa Mujeres Golf Club are an easy drive away.Revato

name: Mio Cancún Hotel Boutique
address: 4 Calle Sierra Smz 3 Mza 10 Lt 12, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Attractively set in Cancún, MIO Cancún Hotel Boutique features air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk. The property is close to popular attractions like Cristo Rey Church, Cancun Bullfight ring and Parque las Palapas. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At MIO Cancún Hotel Boutique rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near MIO Cancún Hotel Boutique include Cancun Government Palace, Cancun Bus Station and Beto Avila Stadium. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 17 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Antillano
address: Avenida Tulum y Claveles,1 Lote 20, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Antillano is located 400 metres from Cancún town centre and 10 minutes’ drive from the beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with free Wi-Fi. Air-conditioned accommodations at Hotel Antillano feature cable TV, a work desk, closet and tiled floor. The bathroom is private and has shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The lobby bar offers beverage and some dishes that can be enjoyed at the pool terrace. Room service is also available. Cancun International Airport is located 15 minutes’ drive. A bus stop is within walking distance from the hotel where guests can take the bus to Playa del Carmen or Chichen Itza.

name: Villa del Palmar Cancun Luxury Beach Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Punta Sam Km. 5.2, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The beachfront Villa del Palmar Cancun Beach Resort & Spa is located just 15 minutes’ drive outside central Cancún. It offers 5 outdoor pools, 4 outdoor hot tubs and elegant, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and a balcony. The rooms at the Villa del Palmar Cancun feature tiled floors and stylish décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom and a kitchenette with a microwave. The hotel organises trips in a glass-bottomed boat, as well as other activities. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do on the Yucatán Peninsula. A buffet breakfast is served on the terrace or in the dining room. The hotel features a Deli and 6 restaurants serving international food. The Mayan ruins at Tulum are around 1.5 hours’ drive from the Villa Palmar. You can drive to Cancún Airport in 25 minutes.
